INPUT.SETUP_BALANCE: First lets enter your current balance...
INPUT.SETUP_INCOME: Now enter the name your source of income... e.g. Salary
INPUT.SETUP_EXPENSE: Now enter some general categories of of things you spend your money on ... e.g. Food
INPUT.SETUP_TIME_FRAME: Now enter the time frame you would like to be a default for you in this app... ---just enter something and skip this :D

LABEL.PROJECT_DESCRIPTION:
This is a personal project for keeping track of my own money.
For practice we added log-in and a functionality for other people to use it as well.
The basic function of this app is to calculate users spending and earning, and sort them in categories of type and time. We will continue adding more features when we feel like it :D Thank you for using our app.
MacroHardInc team:
Lead developer: Mile Ignjatovic
The other developer: Marko Misojcic
"Business analyst" ... or whatever: Nenad Mijailovic

LABEL.PROJECT_EXPLANATION:
We created this app using Angular6 JavaScript framework with Sass, CSS pre-processor.
For a database we are using Farebase Firestore.
We tried to create this app using only our own solutions, but due to lack of time, there were two things that we didnt make ourselves:
1) Login functionality, witch is in fact FirebaseUI (with a fairly straight forward implementation process).
2) Google charts api witch we use for "Statistics" component.
